item.description:
Boston ATP & WLP User's Group:

Fidelity's Active Trader Pro (ATP) and Wealth Lab Pro (WLP) are powerful
programs. We are meeting to collaborate on improving our
skills & developing usable strategies for Active Trader Pro & Wealth Lab Pro.

This group is for those interested in learning Active Trader Pro and Wealth
Lab Pro. We will exchange ideas, research strategies for trading including
back testing, buying and selling stocks and options using automated alerts and
auto-execution with both Active Trader Pro and Wealth Lab Pro.

We will meet in the first floor lobby of MIT Building E-51 adjacent to the parking lot
entrance. We will begin by discussing how to set up and navigate in these
programs. We will also brainstorm possible profitable strategies that can be
tested. Please familiarize yourself with the programs and bring ideas about
which strategies you would like to test.
item.name: Boston ATP & WLP Users Group
